result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brittany Lynn Desteffen

records.addlTxt: Status conference on January 5, 2023 at 10:45 am.

10:59 AM Defendant Brittany Lynn Desteffen in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Brittany Lynn Desteffen.  Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at. Atty Viel requests status in 90 days.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 10:45 am.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

2:57 pm.   Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brittany Lynn Desteffen in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Brittany Lynn Desteffen. Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.
Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:10 PM Defendant Brittany Lynn Desteffen appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Atty Shannon Viel in court for Brittany Desteffen. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Defense waives formal reading of of complaint, waives timelimits for prelim.  JA Parks will schedule prelim.
Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.

11:36 AM Defendant Brittany Lynn Desteffen not in court.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file, reviews affidavit of service showing defendant was served with notice of today's hearing.  Court advises of call from defendant this morning indicating she had car trouble, requested to appear by zoom.  Court had JA Parks advise defendant she still needed to appear in person today.  State requests bench warrant.  Court orders bench warrant.

ADDRESS INFO for Brittany Lynn Desteffen
Current: 1811 Melrose Avenue, Appleton, WI 54911 United States  (Effective: 05-19-2022)
Prior: 1547 Egg Harbor Road Apt 6, Sturgeon Bay, WI
Initial appearance on May 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Initial appearance on May 19, 2011 at 10:00 am.

10:38 AM  Defendant Brittany Lynn Desteffen not in court.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews summons, doesn't see a certificate of service in the file. State requests another date, will summon defendant in as they are unsure if she was served with todays date.  Court reschedules.
Initial appearance scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
